Reviews.Content: relatively hostel 4 bedrooms 3 showers 2 toilets perfectly formed located 2minutes passeig de gracia metro station 10minute walk placa de catalunya corner hostel casa batllo antoni gaudi hopon hopoff tourist bus stops outside building lovely filled designer shops dont expect pick gifts afield hostel clean tidy beds generously single benefit fitting bedside light bed night risk waking sleeping main light risk fumbling dark hostel able accommodate people wheelchairs rely heavy external door using lifts floor
